title: 20 ping dc?
body: who does this game think its ok to dc on 20 ping. It gets really annoying when you randomly dc on 20 ping in a fight

replies.body: Pretty sure this is your internet not the game itself, if you use WiFi then this usually happens because WiFi is not very reliable and if you are using a cable then it does sometimes fall out and disconnect if you move the computer around to much (not very likely). but switching from WiFi to cable fixed all my DC problems apart form actual game crashes and even improved my ping by a little bit. :) Good Luck. PS: do you run the game as administrator? this helped me out with some issues too.
